$block: The TransportAlerta resource is a collection of transports that carry dispatched alerts to the external Alerta service.

$ul: **alertaApiKey**: The API key for the Alerta service.
**alertaCorrelate**: The comma-separated list of related event names for the Alerta service.
**alertaEnvironment**: The environment value for the Alerta service.
**alertaEvent**: The event value for the Alerta service.
**alertaGroup**: The group value for the Alerta service.
**alertaHost**: The host name for the Alerta service (omit the "https://" part).
**alertaOrigin**: The origin value for the Alerta service.
**alertaResource**: The resource value for the Alerta service.
**alertaService**: The comma-separated list of affected services for the Alerta service.
**alertaSeverity**: The severity value for the Alerta service.
**alertaStatus**: The status value for the Alerta service.
**alertaTags**: The comma-separated list of tags for the Alerta service.
**alertaType**: The type value for the Alerta service.
**createdAt**: When the resource instance was created. This date-time is in the UTC timezone.
**dataSegmentCode**: User-provided string on which to segment and filter data. Max 50 characters.
**id**: The unique identifier of the resource instance.
**partition**: The partition that contains this resource instance. The resource cannot be moved to another partition.
**resourceOwner**: The name of the person who owns this resource.
